PERSONA:
meet alice, a 67-year-old married white woman living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region of the united states. alice has completed some college education and holds an associate's degree. although she was born and raised in the u.s., she is tight-lipped about her gender identity.

alice does not affiliate herself with any particular religion, but she attends religious services once or twice a month. politically, she identifies as a very conservative republican and is a registered voter in her current area of residence.

while alice is reluctant to disclose her family income, she seems to have a moderate frequency of internet usage, going online several times a week. despite her age, she does not participate in any volunteer activities.

overall, alice is a private individual who values her personal beliefs and political leanings. she maintains a reserved demeanor but remains engaged with her community through occasional religious gatherings and exercising her right to vote.
